sentences.en: A band played salsa, and spectators danced wildly.
sentences.cn: 乐队演奏萨尔萨舞曲，观众们纵情跳舞。

sentences.en: All the maps we had were wildly inaccurate.
sentences.cn: 我们所有的地图误差都非常大。

sentences.en: As she finished each song, the crowd clapped wildly.
sentences.cn: 她每唱完一首歌，人群就拼命鼓掌。

sentences.en: Everyone was on their feet applauding wildly.
sentences.cn: 每个人都站起身来热烈鼓掌。

sentences.en: George struggled wildly, going under and resurfacing at regular intervals.
sentences.cn: 乔治疯狂地挣扎，不断在水面上浮浮沉沉。
她眼里流露出激动的神情。

sentences.en: Reports of his drinking have been wildly exaggerated.
sentences.cn: 有关他酗酒的报道极尽夸张。

sentences.en: She looked wildly around for an escape.
sentences.cn: 她环顾四周，拼命寻找逃路。

sentences.en: The man lost his temper and struck out wildly.
sentences.cn: 那人因发怒而大打出手.

sentences.en: The shark was writhing around wildly, trying to get free.
sentences.cn: 鲨鱼拼命挣扎，试图逃脱。

sentences.en: The truck sways wildly, careening down narrow mountain roads.
sentences.cn: 卡车疯狂地左摇右晃，从狭窄的山路上急冲而下。

sentences.en: To buy flowers for myself seems wildly self-indulgent.
sentences.cn: 为自己买花似乎太放纵自己了。

words.tran_cn: 野生的；野蛮的；狂热的；荒凉的
盲目开掘油井；从事非法商业活动
野生地；野蛮地；狂暴地；鲁莽地

trans.tran_cn: 疯狂地，粗暴地，野蛮地，野生地，失去控制地
